AboutUs.company_description: At Roshan Darya Pars, we are a leading provider of logistics and transportation services, dedicated to ensuring that your cargo is handled with care and efficiency.
AboutUs.specialization: Specializing in ocean, land, and air transportation, we offer tailored solutions to meet your unique needs, backed by a strong network and advanced technology.
AboutUs.mission: Our mission: 'Your cargo is safe in our hands.' We aim to exceed your expectations with reliable logistics services.

Gallery.gallery_description: Explore our recent projects and operations across the globe.

Quote.quote_description: Contact us for a custom quote tailored to your logistics needs.

FAQ.answer_1: We offer a range of logistics services including transportation, warehousing, and supply chain management.
FAQ.question_2: How can I track my shipment?
FAQ.answer_2: You can track your shipment through our online tracking system or by contacting customer service.
FAQ.answer_3: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
FAQ.question_4: How do I request a quote?
FAQ.answer_4: You can request a quote by filling out the form on our 'Get a Quote' page.
FAQ.answer_5: Yes, we handle both domestic and international shipments.
